lendingkartcareers - Manager/Senior Manager – ( Co-lending )

Location - Ahmedabad, India, Work Type: Full Time

Other December 14, 2021

1.1 Job Overview:

  • Designation : Manager / Sr. Manager Co Lending
  • Location :Ahmedabad
  • Reporting to : Director Co-Lending

1.2 Core Responsibilities:

  • Managing association with banks/NBFCs that are in a Co-lending partnership with LK.
  • Responsible for business volumes with various partners and ensuring scale up of partnership.
  • Business Development and onboarding new partners, aligning the lender on process flow, KYC and documentation and product integration in the LK system and coordinating with internal stakeholders to ensure seamless disbursements.
  • Liaising with lending partners ensuring smooth flow of operations.
  • Driving integration on various aspects of the strategic partnership across Credit, Operations, Risk Management, Technology and Product.
  • Develop and maintain reporting & application systems and coordinate information exchange with partner lenders.
  • Ensure all tasks, deliverables and documentation are created with the highest level of accuracy.
  • Assist in developing business processes to ensure operational efficiency and profitability.
  • Achieve targets as assigned by the organization on a monthly basis through business loans.
  • Managing operational disbursements related queries & resolution of the same
  • Close coordination with operational executives for loan disbursals.

1.3 What are we looking for?

  • Qualifications: MBA/CA
  • Required Experience : 8-10 years
  • Experience of strategic partnerships across Bank/NBFC is a must
  • Experience in Liaising with lending partners/banks/NBFC & FinTech
Apply
